description: Main application setup for an Express.js backend of a food ordering platform. It configures middleware such as CORS, Swagger UI with custom styling, routing, and error handling.

methods.name: app.use(cors(...))
methods.description: Configures CORS middleware to allow all origins and specific HTTP methods and headers.

methods.name: app.set('trust proxy', true)
methods.description: Sets Express to trust reverse proxy headers, useful when behind load balancers.

methods.name: app.use('/docs', swaggerUi.serve, ...)
methods.description: Serves Swagger UI documentation with custom CSS, dynamically adjusting server URL based on request.

methods.name: app.get('/openapi.json', ...)
methods.description: Provides the raw OpenAPI specification in JSON format with dynamic server URL based on request.

methods.name: app.use(express.json())
methods.description: Middleware to parse incoming JSON request bodies.

methods.name: app.use('/', routes)
methods.description: Mounts main route handlers from external routes module.

methods.name: Error handling middleware
methods.description: Handles errors, logs server errors, and responds with JSON error message.
